mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.attachment AS "attachment", b.id AS "resourseType.id", b.name AS "resourseType.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN resourse_type b on b.id=a.type
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM quiz a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.attachment LIKE '%'||#{attachment}||'%' '%'+#{attachment}+'%' concat('%',#{attachment},'%')
AND (b.id= #{resourseType.id} OR b.pids like CONCAT('%,', #{resourseType.id}, ',%') )
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quiz( id, name, attachment, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{attachment}, #{resourseType.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE quiz SET name = #{name}, attachment = #{attachment}, type = #{resourseType.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
